Is there a simple way to insert a note or warning box on a page? Like the blue note boxes here: <https://franklinjl.org/syntax/markdown/>. I tried defining
```\newcommand{\note}[1]{@@note @@title ⚠ Note@@ @@content #1 @@ @@}
\newcommand{\warn}[1]{@@warning @@title ⚠ Warning!@@ @@content #1 @@ @@}```
in my config.md but that doesn’t give me the styling. (I guess I also have to copy some css?)
